metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7244 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The _pcre32_xclass function in pcre_xclass.c in libpcre1 in PCRE 8.40 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> pcre32 support enabled only in pcre3/1:8.35-4 same commit as CVE-2017-7186 ccdm94> in xenial, this CVE was patched together with CVE-2017-7186, since the fixes are the same, i.e. USN-5665-1 fixes this issue without mentioning this CVE.

criterions.comment: pcre3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
